title: Change Ownership of an Annuity
description: An annuity owner wants to transfer ownership of their non-qualified annuity to their child.

tasks.description: Identify the contract holder and verify their request.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer and contract.

tasks.description: Explain that changing ownership is a taxable event for the original owner.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the tax consequences of the transfer.

tasks.description: Provide the correct forms to complete the ownership change.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the required legal forms to the customer.
